script:
SetEnabled cmsn_askCommission false
FireBest CMSNTextUnsuited
PrivateeringCommission printRequirements

options:
0:cmsn_accept:Accept $factionAOrAn $faction commission
1:cmsn_cancel:"Perhaps I'm not quite ready for this."

script:
FireBest CMSNTextWelcomePart1
PrivateeringCommission accept
FireBest CMSNTextWelcomePart2
FireAll PopulateOptions

text: Meanwhile, you skim and certify the executive summary of the Persean League commission credentials.
